alert.note: Alert for West Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 22 at 2:41PM MST until February 23 at 6:00AM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 40 to 50 mph with gusts up to 80 mph expected. * WHERE...Sacramento Mountains in northeast Otero County. * WHEN...Now through 6 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will peak Wednesday afternoon. Blowing snow may reduce visibility at times.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: West Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet
